DOC.brief_summary: Osteochondral lesions in knee and ankle are injuries commonly seen in young patients. MaioRegen fleece is a cartilage substitute which can be used in circumscribed defects. This prospective study follows patients treated with MaioRegen implants from pre-surgery until 24 months post-surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical and Radiological Results of Osteochondral Repair Using MaioRegen in Knee and Ankle Surgery
DOC.criteria: single osteochondral lesion in knee/ankle (24 sq cm) multiple osteochondral lesions preexisting injuries/arthropathies
